Package nl.strohalm.cyclos.http

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AttributeHolder
    Denotes servlet components which hold attributes
    Resettable
    Implemented by object wrappers which keeps state of other objects, being able to reset to the original state or apply pending changes to the original object
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AttributeHolder.Factory  
    BaseFilter
    Base implementation for filters which inject beans on itself using SpringHelper.injectBeans(ServletContext, Object)
    BaseWebServiceTransactionFilter
    Base filter for web services transaction management
    HttpSessionWrapper
    Wrapper for an HttpSession
    JspTransactionFilter
    A filter used to make sure that JSP execution is done within a read-only database transaction
    LifecycleListener
    Listener for context events
    LoggedUserFilter
    Filter that will set a ThreadLocal with the logged user
    OncePerRequestFilter
    A filter which is guaranteed to execute only once per request.
    PosWebFilter
    Filter used to optionally disable the posweb, according to the cyclos.properties
    RequestProcessingFilter
    Filter used to apply the correct character encoding
    ResettableAttributeHolder
    An AttributeHolder which has another AttributeHolder as base, and keeps a local copy of the attributes.
    ResettableHttpServletRequest
    An HttpServletRequest which wraps another request, keeping track of changes.
    ResettableHttpServletResponse
    An HttpServletResponse which wraps another response, keeping track of changes.
    ResettableHttpSession
    An HttpSession which wraps another session, keeping track of changes.
    RestFilter
    Filter which handles the REST services context
    SanitizedHttpServletRequest  
    SanitizerFilter
    Filter used to apply the correct character encoding
    StringBodyRequest
    A HttpServletRequest that allows reading the body at any time
    WebServicesTransactionFilter
    A filter which manages database transactions for web services
